summary: A collection of general‑purpose helper utilities for the IVADOMED framework, covering command‑line argument handling, environment detection (OS, memory, CUDA), device configuration, path and file management, version and git information, checksum generation, and optional integration with Weights & Biases logging.
business_intent: Facilitate reproducible deep‑learning experiments in medical imaging by abstracting low‑level system interactions, simplifying configuration and device setup, and providing optional experiment tracking support.
